title: T206 Christy Mathewson white cap Old Mill SUPER TOUGH SGC 1 - $1800

posts.post_title: T206 Christy Mathewson white cap Old Mill SUPER TOUGH SGC 1 - $1800
posts.post_content:
This is a very difficult combination - rarely seen.  PSA pop is 9 and SGC pop is 3.

$1800 (free shipping, price assumes no fee method, goods please add 3%)
And a very presentable "1" to boot.
